title: Authors and Citation
text: Thomsen (2025). mighty.standards: Standard derivations ADaM generation. R package version 0.0.0.9004, https://nn-opensource.github.io/mighty.standards.
code: @Manual{,   title = {mighty.standards: Standard derivations for ADaM generation},   author = {Aksel Thomsen},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9004},   url = {https://nn-opensource.github.io/mighty.standards}, }

title: Standard derivations for ADaM generation
text: mighty.standards serve repository generic compute component classes used produce ADaM scripts {mighty} framework.

title: Standard derivations for ADaM generation
text: can install development version mighty.standards GitHub :

title: Standard derivations for ADaM generation
text: mighty.standards provide generic classes work standard components, helper functions retrieve . now also holds small temporary library components. See vignette("mighty-standards") work standard components.

title: Retrieve mighty standard component — get_standard
text: Retrieve either generalized standard component (template) rendered standard component code ready use. get_standard(): Returns object class mighty_component get_rendered_standard(): Returns object class mighty_component_rendered rendering standard required list parameters depends standard. Check documentation specific standard details.

title: Retrieve mighty standard component — get_standard
text: standard character name standard component retrieve. params named list input parameters. Passed along mighty_component$render().

title: Retrieve mighty standard component — get_standard
code: get_standard("ady") #> <mighty_component/R6> #> Type: derivation #> Parameters: #> • variable: `character` Name of new variable to create #> • date: `character` Name of date variable to use #> Depends: #> • .self.{{ date }} #> • .self.TRTSDT #> Outputs: #> • {{ variable }}  get_rendered_standard("ady", list(variable = "ASTDY", date = "ASTDT")) #> <mighty_component_rendered/mighty_component/R6> #> Type: derivation #> Depends: #> • .self.ASTDT #> • .self.TRTSDT #> Outputs: #> • ASTDY #> Code: #> .self <- .self |> #>   dplyr::mutate( #>     ASTDY = admiral::compute_duration( #>       start_date = TRTSDT, #>       end_date = ASTDT, #>       in_unit = "days", #>       out_unit = "days", #>       add_one = TRUE #>     ) #>   )

title: List all available standards — list_standards
text: List available mighty standard components.

title: List all available standards — list_standards
text: character vector standard names

title: List all available standards — list_standards
code: available_standards <- list_standards() cat(available_standards, sep = "\n") #> ady #> aendt #> assign #> astdt #> predecessor #> trtemfl

title: Mighty standard component — mighty_component
text: Class generic mighty standard component. mighty framework, "component" code template processes input data returns modified version new columns rows. Standard components share common structure roxygen-like documentation pattern, facilitating use inside mighty.

title: Mighty standard component — mighty_component
text: Templates character vectors R code interpreted. Dynamic use variables etc. supported using mustache framework. Dynamic parameters specified using {{ variable_name }}.

title: Mighty standard component — mighty_component
text: template required documented following tags similar documenting functions using roxygen2:

title: Mighty standard component — mighty_component
text: template standard components follow conventions: input data set always called .self. Additional parameters used render template R code documented @param tag. template ends creating modified version .self. Template documented roxygen-like tags

title: Mighty standard component — mighty_component
text: example mighty component template creates new dynamic variable variable twice value dynamic input x, already input data set .self.   rendered parameters variable = "" x = "B" rendered code used mighty becomes:
code: #' Title for my component #' @description #' A more in depth description of what is being done #' #' @param variable dynamic output if applicable #' @param x some other input to the component #' @type derivation #' @depends .self {{ x }} #' @outputs {{ variable }} .self <- .self |>   dplyr::mutate(     {{ variable }} = 2 * {{ x }}   ) .self <- .self |>   dplyr::mutate(     A = 2 * B   )

title: Mighty standard component — mighty_component
text: code code block component. template complete template. type type component. Can one predecessor, derivation, row. depends Data.frame listing components dependencies. outputs List new columns created component. params List parameters need supplied rendering component.

title: Mighty standard component — mighty_component
text: mighty_component$new() mighty_component$print() mighty_component$render() mighty_component$document() mighty_component$clone()
